content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper Mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a burner-mining-drill at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone-furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)

### Copper Mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of a stone-furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Inserter System at position(x=39.5, y=-79.5)
Consists of a burner-inserter at position(x=39.5, y=-79.5) and a burner-inserter at position(x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Power Generation System at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of an offshore-pump at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5), a boiler at position(x=111.5, y=-32.0), and a steam-engine at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)

### Transport System at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of a belt-group at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5) and transport-belts at positions(x=63.5, y=-53.5) and (x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
* Errors when entities are not fueled: Ensure that burner-mining-drills, stone-furnaces, and boilers have a fuel source.
* Errors when entities are not connected: Ensure that steam-engines are connected to a power source.
* Errors when entities are not plugged into the electric network: Ensure that electricity-groups are plugged into the electric network.
* Errors when inserter systems are waiting for source items: Ensure that burner-inserters have a source of items to insert.

# NAMESPACE
* No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
* No important variables have been assigned by the agent.
